thread.title: Contactless cards replace cash as shoppers flash the plastic
thread.title_full: Contactless cards replace cash as shoppers flash the plastic

author: Tim Wallace
title: Contactless cards replace cash as shoppers flash the plastic
text: Contactless cards replace cash as shoppers flash the plastic Shoppers are using cards for smaller transactions rather than just big purchases The average value of card transactions is falling as customers use new contactless technology instead of cash Photo: Alamy
